context_bundle.content:
Serialization error handling.

Common Issues:
- Circular references
- BigInt serialization
- Date/time formats
- Binary data encoding
- Undefined vs null

JSON Specific:
- JSON.stringify circular ref error
- NaN/Infinity become null
- Function properties lost
- Symbol keys ignored

Fixes:
- Custom serializers (replacer function)
- Class toJSON methods
- Schema validation
- Type coercion handling
